thread.title: PANHANDLE OIL AND GAS INC. Announces Dividend Payment

author: cnbc.com
title: PANHANDLE OIL AND GAS INC. Announces Dividend Payment
text:
OKLAHOMA CITY, May 24, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- PANHANDLE OIL AND GAS INC . (NYSE: PHX) announced that its Board of Directors, at its May 24, 2018, meeting, approved a payment of the regular 4 cents per share quarterly dividend. The dividend will be payable on June 19, 2018, to shareholders of record on June 5, 2018.
Panhandle Oil and Gas Inc. (NYSE: PHX) is engaged in the exploration for and production of natural gas and oil. Additional information on the Company can be found on the Internet at www.panhandleoilandgas.com .
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/panhandle-oil-and-gas-inc-announces-dividend-payment-300654604.html
SOURCE PANHANDLE OIL AND GAS INC.
